title: Dido - 2003 - Life for rent [Bonus track]
description:

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Recording

Playback by Pioneer PD-91
Recorded through optical input on Razer Barracuda AC-1 by Audacity for Win32 1.2.6.
Converted from dual channel 32-bit PCM to FLAC by dBpoweramp

Equipment

Razer can be found at http://www.razerzone.com/
Audacity can be found at http://audacity.sourceforge.net/
dBpoweramp can be found at http://www.dbpoweramp.com/professional.htm

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This record is one good example of the record companies ripping off paying
music lovers. I avoid these CD-like products that just *may* play on the
equipment that I choose, but most Internet record stores list these products
just as if they would be Compact discs. They are not.

Enjoy this lossless rip, and remember that the CD-like editions will sell for
about as long as we buy them.  Please try to avoid copy protected material from
Sony/BMG and notify them about the real loss they suffer.

Note that you should be able to return a purchased disc to the shop with a full refound.

Enjoy.
